@Weibs wrote:

I see you’re using my coord vars, lol.

Anyways, this would be useful, but I think it might be a little too specific for SRL. You could try converting it so that the user puts in what symbol to find, then the script could be used for more purposes.

item.title: Useful Procedure For Powerminers
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

you probably dont need to rotate the map, if you dont see it at all in the minimap, since it is roughly circular, you are probably too far away

item.title: Useful Procedure For Powerminers
item.dc:creator: @arr0w Arr0w
item.description:
@arr0w wrote:

hello i sjut quickly made this for my powermienr and though id post it here.

[scar]Procedure WeAtMine;
Var
WX, WY : Integer;

Begin
If (Not(FindSymbol(Wx, WY, ‘mining site’))) Then
Begin
RunWhere(‘N’, false)
If (Not(FindSymbol(Wx, WY, ‘mining site’))) Then
Begin
RunBack;
Flag;
RunWhere(‘E’, False)
If (Not(FindSymbol(Wx, WY, ‘mining site’))) Then
Begin
RunBack;
Flag;
RunWhere(‘S’, False)
If (Not(FindSymbol(Wx, WY, ‘mining site’))) Then
Begin
RunBack;
Flag;
Runwhere(‘W’, False)
If (Not(FindSymbol(Wx, WY, ‘mining site’))) Then
WriteLn(‘We are defantly lost termInating script’)
TerminateScript;
End;
End;
End;
End;[/scar]

Place where you coulkd use:

[scar]Procedure Mine;
Begin
WeAtMine;
Letsmine;
end;
[/scar]
There[br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 07:25:21 AM[/size][hr]post your thoughs
